name: Rocket of Milky Way
description:
ROCKET OF MILKY WAY

--------------------------------------

Spaceship arrived to Universe of WebGL. Amazing pixel art and retro style, that is Rocket of Milky Way. Are you great pilot or you have fear from deep space? Get ready to fight for your life. There are many problems you must solve!

For example:

- Your ship running out of fuel. Can you pick up enough fuel?

- You have to shot your way through asteroid belt

- Beware of aliens!

How long can you survive in deep space? Try your skills and become legend.
